content.question: How is the speaker similar to the “fierce thing” mentioned in line 3 ?

choices.label: Both are severely impaired by their own intense emotion.
Both feel physically ill as a result of their overwhelming anger.
Both feel burdened by the necessity of speaking eloquently.
Both find that their passion paradoxically empties them of words.

content.answer: Both are severely impaired by their own intense emotion.

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
